hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Try holding a D-pad button on the item screen.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Farore's Wind#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Big Lava Room Blocked Door Chest

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Hookshot#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #3# major items.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #the Market# is on the path to #Twinrova#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Goron City# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #Morpha#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: The hint stone you have dialed&has been disconnected.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that on the path to the #right hand of the Spirit Temple# a chest and a spider hold...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #an Ocarina#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest
Spirit Temple GS Hall After Sun Block Room

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #Bongo Bongo#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Temple Boss Key#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Forest Temple Boss Key# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right hand# is #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZD (Mweep).text: What is a Hylian? A miserable little pile of secrets!

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple GS Sun on Floor Room

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #the Gerudo Card#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that in the #central rooms of the well# spiders hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Nayru's Love#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well GS West Inner Room
Bottom of the Well GS East Inner Room

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a #fairy outside Hyrule Castle# holds #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
